name: Mojo Helpdesk
shortDescription: Q app for Mojo Helpdesk ticket tracking service
longDescription: Mojo Helpdesk ticket tracking track requests untill they get done.

questions.label: apiKey
questions.help: Your Mojo Helpdesk API key can be found in your help desk user profile.

triggers.name: Mojo Number
triggers.description: Triggers when your Mojo # is above a certain level

questions.label: Triggers when your Mojo # is greater than
questions.help: This Mojo Helpdesk trigger will fire is your Mojo # is above the number you enter

triggers.name: Mojo New Ticket
triggers.description: Triggers when a new and unassigned ticket is created in your Help desk.
